text: Nurlan Utebovich Balgimbayev (20 November 1947 â€“ 14 October 2015) was the Prime Minister of Kazakhstan from 10 October 1997 to 1 October 1999. He became the President of the Kazakhstan Oil Investment Company in February 2002. On 14 October 2015, Balgimbayev died in Atyrau at the age of 68 of cancer. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Kazakhstan Category:Deaths from cancer
title: Nurlan Balgimbayev
